message.body: Thinking about it we probably want to steal Tim's truck to move my bigger stuff not johns wimp ass truck
Tim traded in his big white truck and now has a whimp ass Ranger. Same size as John's and mine.
Gas will be going up because of the shit going on in Egypt.
So does a queen fit in the back of a wimp ass truck
yes we stand it up on end and tie it down

K. I just need to convince people to come because I have couch one shelf thing mom said she wanted instead of me throwing away, my mini fridge and my bed. I think the shelf thing might fit in KarL but the rest needs truck love.
I've been trying to get John up here with the promise of pizza and wine but he doesn't care cuz he's on lock down
yeah he is the only $60k a year lock down guy I know
Right? And I have all the ingredients for the pizza and I have wine all he has to do is show up
he is a pussy what can I say, his name is johnny girl
I forget that sometimes I admit. Maybe ill convince him for this Saturday
good luck, sometimes he complains about gas to go to woody
I just texted him. I have 5 pizza crusts he could eat til he bursts! And 4.5 bottles of wine right now. If Amanda doesn't come over I should still have 3
might need to throw in some azullitas
what sucks is your american eagle credit card bill came in and it says pay up bitch!
Yup I can throw down some azulitas. Just saying I'm kind of a fun person even if gas sucks
I did yesterday :p take that AE bill
